Scatter.Description: 3 or more Scatter Symbols activate the Free Spins Feature.

Scatter2.Description: 3 or more Scatter2 Symbols activate the Alternative Free Spins Feature.

Wild.Description: Substitutes any Symbol except Scatter and Scatter2. Expands for the whole reel during Free Spins Feature.

Wild2.Description: Substitutes any Symbol. Appears on 3rd reel only during Free Spins Feature. Has a chance of x2 or x5 multiplier.

Wild3.Description: Substitutes any Symbol. Appears on 3rd reel only during Alternative Free Spins Feature and is Stacked

Rules.Description: Winning combination must start from left most reel and the subsequent symbols have to be on the consecutive reels, except for Scatter.

BulletsText: Quick Stop: To play faster, Tap the "SPIN" button and tap it again. The reels will stop immediately!
Modify Total Bet: Tap the + or - buttons in the "Total Bet" area
Auto Spin: To activate Auto Spin, Tap and hold the "SPIN" button. To deactivate Auto Spin, tap the "SPIN" button again
